skills.name: EXODUS
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 75% Chance to Remove Beneficial Effects on the target.
• Lower DEF of enemy for 2 turns.

skills.name: FORCE
desc: • Force Shield blocks all damage for 5 hits, regardless of damage type or amount.

skills.name: REVENGE
desc: 35% Chance to counterattack when an ally gets attacked.
